subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin St. Louis scored in overtime to give the Rangers a 3-1 series lead in the Eastern Conference finals, and a chance to clinch a berth in the Stanley Cup finals for the first time in 20 years.
snippet: Martin St. Louis scored in overtime to give the Rangers a 3-1 series lead in the Eastern Conference finals, and a chance to clinch a berth in the Stanley Cup finals for the first time in 20 years.
